text: "Silent Night" is a 1985 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi. It is the last single from their second studio album 7800Â° Fahrenheit. It went to number 24 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart and did not chart on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Silent Night (Bon Jovi song)
